oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Death of the narrator s first wife, which was foretold by springbok and gemsbok. By Dia!kw in (L V.
4688). An account of what the springbok did when Dia!kwain's first wife (Mietje) died. Ssu
tta points out that he had told Dia!kwain that the actions of the game foretold what was happening at home.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What the springbok and the gemsbok did when they knew that Dia!kwain's wife would die
